snippet: Originally an oral tradition to pass on wisdom from a family patriarch or matriarch, ethical wills today are more likely to be videos or Facebook pages.
abstract: Retiring column; more people are opting to draw up ethical wills, nonlegal documents that pass on heartfelt wisdom to future generations; many are also giving the technical will a high-technology makeover, using videos, DVDs, and even Facebook pages to put human touch on their legacies.
lead_paragraph: Originally an oral tradition to pass on wisdom from a family patriarch or matriarch, ethical wills today are more likely to be videos or Facebook pages.

headline.main: The Ethical Will, an Ancient Concept, Is Revamped for the Tech Age
headline.print_headline: The Ethical Will, an Ancient Concept, Is Revamped for the Tech Age
